MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G74 postcode area of East Kilbride. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:02pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations into the underground cable fault on Kittoch Street and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:30am on 27th Aprill
